thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com | 3 of 5
thread.title: ERIN
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by ERIN

author: ERIN
title: ERIN
text: My son needed a vehicle with an S break in the middle so we rented one from Verc. It was a lot more expensive to rent than a normal rental as there is risk with permit driver etc . And you have to bring the car back in less than 12 hours . But the car rental agent was very helpful and blocked the camera on the car for the test and gave encouragement . My son passed test . We dropped off car after hours and left key in mailbox .
